channel.description: Creating a List list_1 = [] list_2 = [1, 2, 3] Adding to a List list_2 = [1, 2, 3] list_2.append(4) Accessing List Items list_2 = [1, 2, 3] print(list_2[0]) # 1 print(list_2[1]) # 2 print(list_2[2]) # 3 Updating List Items list_2 = [1, 2, 3] list_2[1] = 5 print(list_2) # [1, 5, 3] def main(): sums = [] total = 0 for i in range(1, 5): total = total + i sums.
